definition: A state of curiosity, attraction, or concern towards a particular subject, activity, or event. It is commonly used to describe one's inclination or desire to engage with or learn more about something.

examples.german: Ich habe Interesse an diesem Projekt.
examples.english: I am interested in this project.

examples.german: Sie hat gro√ües Interesse an Kunst.
examples.english: She has a great interest in art.

examples.german: Er zeigt wenig Interesse an Politik.
examples.english: He shows little interest in politics.

examples.german: Ich habe kein Interesse daran, mit ihm zu sprechen.
examples.english: I have no interest in talking to him.
